DESCRIPTION_EXTENSION: Improve experience on Disney plus web application.
SHOW_TRAILER_ON_THE_BIG_CARD: Show Trailer on the big card.
SUGGESTION_TO_SHOW_TRAILERS_ON_THE_HERO_: Suggestion to show trailers on the hero header on the home page.
SUGGESTION_TO_SHOW_TRAILER_ON_THE_HERO_H: Suggestion to show trailer on the hero header on the movie page and show page.
ENABLE_FULLSCREEN_WHEN_DOUBLE_CLICK_ON_A: Enable fullscreen when double click on a movie or show screen.
SUBJECT: Subject
FULLNAME_IS_A_REQUIRED_FIELD: Full Name is a required field
EMAIL_MUST_BE_A_VALID_EMAIL: Email must be a valid email
THANK_YOU_MESSAGE_RECEIVED_I_WILL_DO_MY_: Thank you, I received your message. I will do my best to answer as soon as possible.
